credit_line: Gift of the artist in honor of S. Lane Faison, Jr.
title: The Oxbow: After Church, after Cole, Flooded (Flooded River for S. Lane Faison, Jr.)
inscriptions: On verso on board backing: The Oxbow: After Church, after Cole, Flooded (Flooded River for S. Lane Faison, Jr.) polished oil on canvas, 40" x 60", Stephen Hannock 5/2002
